title: Agent Error Response Message
description: A response message from a Desktop Agent to the Bridge containing an error, to be used in preference to the standard response when an error needs to be returned.

type.title: Response Message Type
type.description: Identifies the type of the message and it is typically set to the FDC3 function name that the message relates to, e.g. 'findIntent', with 'Response' appended.

payload.title: Error Response Message Payload
payload.description: Error message payload containing an standardized error string.
